kit.leader_skill: STR Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Fists of Rage (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes supreme damage and; lowers ATK & DEF; A medium chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Appreciation for Goku
passive_skill.effect: For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Damage reduction rate 30% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 100% up; After receiving an attack: Ki +3, ATK 180% up and guards all attacks for 5 turn(s); For every attack received: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 10% up (up to 40%); (Forever) DEF 20% up (up to 80%); Before receiving 8 attack(s) in battle: DEF 180% up; After receiving 8 or more attacks in battle: (Forever) Starting from the character's next attacking turn, "DB Saga" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up and for allies whose names include "Goku (Youth)", plus an additional Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 20% up; When there is a "Goku's Family" Category ally on the team: ATK & DEF 180% up

lines.context: For 1 turn from the character's entry turn
When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Ki +3, ATK 180% up and guards all attacks for 5 turn(s)
Starting from the character's next attacking turn, "DB Saga" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up and for allies whose names include "Goku (Youth)", plus an additional Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 20% up
lines.context: After receiving 8 or more attacks in battle
When there is a "Goku's Family" Category ally on the team

kit.leader_skill: STR Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +90%

super_attack.name: Fists of Rage
super_attack.effect: Causes supreme damage; Lowers ATK & DEF; A medium chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Appreciation for Goku
passive_skill.effect: After receiving an attack: ATK 150% up and guards all attacks for 3 turn(s); For every attack received: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 8% up (up to 40%); When there is a "Goku's Family" Category ally on the team: ATK & DEF 120% up

lines.text: ATK 150% up and guards all attacks for 3 turn(s)

lines.context: When there is a "Goku's Family" Category ally on the team
